Text: Question # 1: Johnny's mother had three children. The clues all pointed straight to Johnny.
Question # 2: The word 'incorrectly' always hangs itself with the wrong spelling, so of course the answer was incorrectly.
Question # 3: The butcher shop clerk weighs meat. Dr. Evil laughs out loud as you find the obvious answer.
"Good job! You got them all right! Give him what he deserves, Mini Me!" Mini Me stands and gives you the finger.
Dr. Evil leans in close. "-I told you! the Justice Force would never know what hit them. You have the mind I need."
Note to Agent: stop before the job offer scene (drevilscommandcenter_drevil_002_sequence).
